title: Tech View: Nifty50 breaks below key support; trend turns decisively negative - Economic Times
content: Tech View: Nifty50 breaks below key support; trend turns decisively negative  Economic Times
description: To be sure, Nifty50 had made a 'Death Cross' in the previous session, which was a negative development. To add to that the index could not respect a key support of 17,000 level on Tuesday, which intensified the selling pressure. Analysts said more downside is likely for the index.
